divs: Sighting DetailsI was on a party in a little playground taking pictures, The sky was so clear, blu a lot of aircrafts and jets were crsossing the sky on one airport aproaching wway. Then I want to take pictures of these airjets, then I saw a silver flying object in straight line corssing very high. I toke the camera and use the zoom to take pictures of it. Thats is it, I try to take more and nore pictures but I loose the vision because the roof cover my camera and I cant get out to take more picutres because I was in a kids party. Thank you I want to know i this pictures area a real UFO or are a ballon. but I have my doubrts beciuase this object has a very straight way across the sky I think a ballon maybe has other kind of movements. Mexico city Saturday
Summary: Clear sky one silver UFO object
